sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"疼，疼痛"之意。
means: ache ：指人体某一器官较持久的疼痛，常常是隐痛。
pain ：可与ache换用，但pain既可指一般疼痛，也可指剧痛，疼痛范围可以是局部或全身，时间可长可短。也可引申指精神上的痛苦。
sore ：指身体某部位的痛处，有是也指精神上的痛苦。

stems_affixes.word_buile: pain惩罚;痛苦+ful……的→adj.疼痛的, 使痛苦的
pain惩罚;痛苦→n.痛苦, 疼, 痛 v.使痛苦
pain惩罚;痛苦→n.痛苦, 疼, 痛 v.使痛苦

word_mean: 疼痛，痛：多少有些局限的不适感、困苦痛苦感和剧烈困苦感，因特化的神经末梢受到刺激而起，系一种保护性机制，因它可使感到疼痛者除去或离开刺激源

Sentence.sentence: Despite the pain, I stayed the course walking a bit and then running again.

Sentence.sentence: He had no food or water and he was in terrible pain.

Sentence.sentence: He has a pain in his knee.

Sentence.sentence: However, here are some examples: being cut off in traffic, a deadline approaching, experiencing physical pain, and much more.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Maybe the first plant just made a cry of pain or was sending a message to its own branches, and so, in effect, was talking to itself.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Most people treat their tension headaches with pain medicine.

Sentence.sentence: People often think of gossipers as harmless, but cruel lies can cause pain.

Sentence.sentence: Symptoms of it include a headache that is constant but not severe, and a pain at the back of your head and the neck.

Sentence.sentence: The moments when I think cooking is a pain are when I'm already hungry and there is nothing ready to eat.

Sentence.sentence: There was no cure, only pain relief.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: To avoid knee pain, you can run on soft surfaces, do exercises to strengthen your leg muscles, avoid hills and get good running shoes.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Mental health allows us to view others with sympathy if they are having troubles ,with kindness if they are in pain,and with unconditional love no matter who they are.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: This could be no more than a passing literary craze, but it also points to a broader truth about how we now approach the past: less concerned with learning from forefathers and more interested in feeling their pain.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: 痛苦, 苦恼, 烦恼

sentences.en: The pain eased slightly.
sentences.cn: 痛苦稍有减轻。

sentences.en: His behaviour caused his parents a great deal of pain.
sentences.cn: 他的所作所为使他的父母极为难过。

means.word_mean: 身体某部分的疼痛[不适]

sentences.en: Mother has a pain in her chest.
sentences.cn: 母亲胸口疼。

sentences.en: She asked after the aches and pains of all the old people.
sentences.cn: 她询问了所有老人的各种病痛。

sentences.en: She's a real pain.
sentences.cn: 她真是个讨厌的人。

means.word_mean: 劳苦, 辛劳, 烦劳

sentences.en: My pains have been rewarded.
sentences.cn: 我的努力已得到报偿。

means.word_mean: (使)疼痛; (使)痛苦; 伤害; 使苦恼

sentences.en: My tooth is paining.
sentences.cn: 我牙痛。

sentences.en: Her injured arm pained her sharply.
sentences.cn: 她那受伤的手臂使她感到剧烈疼痛。

sentences.en: It pains me to have to leave, but I must.
sentences.cn: 不得不离开使我感到痛苦, 但我必须离开。

sentences.en: It pained him that his father talked like that.
sentences.cn: 他父亲那样说使他痛苦。</seg>

data.mean: 讨厌的人（或事）；令人头痛的人（或事）

sentence.cn: 它有助于消除持续的疼痛。
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 听力 选项

sentence.cn: 人们通常认为闲话无害，但残忍的谎言会带来痛苦。
sentence.en: People often think of gossipers as harmless,  but cruel lies can cause pain.
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)as an unfairly bad return for efforts or trouble
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)作为对努力或辛苦的不公平的报酬

lj.lj_ly: he was sued for his pains.

jx.jx_en_mean: (chiefly N.Amer.)suffering is necessary in order to achieve something
the penalty for disobedience or shortcoming being

lj.lj_ly: they proscribed all such practices and observances on pain of death.
lj.lj_ls: 他们禁止所有这类风俗习惯，违者处死。

phrase.cizu_name: on pain of 或 under pain of

jx.jx_en_mean: Subject to the penalty of a specified punishment, such as death.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 违则以…处罚：应受一种指定惩罚的刑罚，如死刑

entry.def: Pain is the feeling of great discomfort you have, for example when you have been hurt or when you are ill.

example.ex: ...a bone disease that caused excruciating pain...

entry.def: Pain is the feeling of unhappiness that you have when something unpleasant or upsetting happens.

example.ex: ...grey eyes that seemed filled with pain.
example.tran: 似乎充满了痛苦的灰眼睛

entry.def: If a fact or idea pains you, it makes you feel upset and disappointed.

example.ex: This public acknowledgment of Ted's disability pained my mother...
example.tran: 这一下大家都知道了特德的残疾，这让母亲非常痛苦。

example.ex: It pains me to think of you struggling all alone.
example.tran: 想到你一个人苦苦挣扎，我很难过。

entry.def: In informal English, if you call someone or something a pain or a pain in the neck, you mean that they are very annoying or irritating. Expressions such as a pain in the arse and a pain in the backside in British English, or a pain in the ass and a pain in the butt in American English, are also used, but most people consider them offensive.
entry.tran: 讨厌鬼，烦心事（英国英语亦用a pain in the arse, a pain in the backside等，美国英语亦用a pain in the ass, a pain in the butt等，但多数人认为具冒犯意味）

entry.def: If someone is at pains to do something, they are very eager and anxious to do it, especially because they want to avoid a difficult situation.
entry.tran: （尤指为避免困境而）急切想做，迫切想要做

example.ex: Mobil is at pains to point out that the chances of an explosion at the site are remote.
example.tran: 美孚公司急于说明那个地点发生爆炸的可能性微乎其微。

entry.def: You say that something was all you got for your pains when you are mentioning the disappointing result of situation into which you put a lot of work or effort.
entry.tran: 作为辛劳的回报；付出千辛万苦，到头来却…

example.ex: All Corfield got for his pains was a bullet in the head...
example.tran: 科菲尔德千辛万苦，到头来却被一枪爆头。

example.ex: The Professor lavished his learning on the young visitor but gained little gratitude for his pains.
example.tran: 教授将自己的学识倾囊传授给那位年轻访客，到头来却没有获得一点感激。

entry.def: If someone is ordered not to do something on pain of or under pain of death, imprisonment, or arrest, they will be killed, put in prison, or arrested if they do it.

example.ex: We were forbidden, under pain of imprisonment, to use our native language.
example.tran: 我们被禁止使用母语，违者将被关进监狱。

entry.def: If you take pains to do something or go to great pains to do something, you try hard to do it, because you think it is important to do it.

example.ex: Social workers went to great pains to acknowledge men's domestic rights...
example.tran: 社会工作者尽量尊重男性的家庭权利。

example.ex: I had taken great pains with my appearance.
example.tran: 我在自己的容貌上下了很多工夫。

means.word_mean: 1. a symptom of some physical hurt or disorder;

sentences.sentence: "the patient developed severe pain and distension"

means.word_mean: 2. emotional distress; a fundamental feeling that people try to avoid;
3. a somatic sensation of acute discomfort;

sentences.sentence: "as the intensity increased the sensation changed from tickle to pain"

means.word_mean: 5. something or someone that causes trouble; a source of unhappiness;

sentences.sentence: "washing dishes was a nuisance before we got a dish washer"
"he's not a friend, he's an infliction"

means.word_mean: 2. cause emotional anguish or make miserable;

sentences.sentence: "It pains me to see my children not being taught well in school"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'suffering inflicted as punishment for an offence'): from Old French peine, from Latin poena 'penalty', later 'pain'

sentences.cn: 把过去记得太清楚可能令人非常难以从痛苦和遗憾中走出来。
sentences.en: Viewing the past in high definition can make it very difficult to get over pain and regret.

sentences.en: After the failure in love, he is in extreme pain.

sentences.cn: 我的鞋底子破了.

sentences.cn: 你可以只听天由命,慢慢地学, 有时候或许会很痛苦.
sentences.en: You can resign to your fate and learn gradually, which may sometimes bring you much pain.

sentences.cn: 月亮阴暗处地城堡里,那些聚集在一同沉浸在痛苦中地少女是什么人?
sentences.en: Who are those little girls in pain? just trapped in castle of dark side of moon.

sentences.cn: 然而, 即便非灵能生物也会迟钝地感受到心灵攻击模式造成的痛苦.
sentences.en: Still, even a nonpsionic being can feel the pain of a psionic attack mode albeit blunted.

sentences.cn: 在所有的痛苦中, 最坏的痛苦就是爱人而不为人所爱.
sentences.en: Of all pains, the greatest pain, is to be love, but love in rain.

sentences.cn: 在生命中,你曾有过不得不面对痛苦和失落的时刻 吗 ?
sentences.en: Are you being called to taste some bitter cup of pain or loss?

sentences.cn: 伴随着生命拔节的响亮,无数的痛苦也汹涌而来.
sentences.en: And as time goes by numberless pains come flying at me.

sentences.cn: 没有苦难就没有收获; 没有荆棘就没有宝座; 没有痛苦就没有辉煌; 没有十字架就没有冠冕.
sentences.en: No pain, no palm ; no throne; no gall, no glory; no cross, no crown.

sentences.cn: 没有痛苦, 就没有收获!
sentences.en: No pain, no gain!

sentences.cn: 党中央没有忘记这个地方. 你们的痛苦就是我们的痛苦.
sentences.en: Wenchuan is not forgotten by the central government. Your pain is our pain as well.

sentences.cn: 她渴望自己能够有段时间感受不到任何痛苦.
sentences.en: She ached for a time when she did not feel any pain.

sentences.cn: 风猛烈地刮, 并且爆破的森林好像在痛苦里呻吟.
sentences.en: The wind blew hard, and the blasted forest groaned as if in pain.

sentences.cn: 人生就是学会享受痛苦!
sentences.en: Life about learning to enjoy pain!

sentences.cn: 把伤心的事告诉朋友能帮你减轻心中的痛苦.
sentences.en: Telling your sorrow to your friends will relieve the pain in your heart.

sentences.cn: 艺术家和诗人的批判性锋芒,流露出对西方文明深深的痛苦 、 无尽的失望和悲哀.
sentences.en: Their animadversion caused from the deep pain, disappoint and sorrow to the western civilization.

sentences.en: Prayer cleanses the soul, but pain cleanses the body.

sentences.cn: 双胞胎之一的罗伯特感到强烈的痛苦时,他的弟弟打破了脚踝.
sentences.en: A twin named Robert felt a strong pain when his brother broke an ankle.

sentences.cn: 我发现,只要能做到同甘共苦,人们便能承受很大的痛苦.
sentences.en: I discovered that people accept a lot of pain if everybody's going through the chute together.

sentences.cn: 要麽你被痛苦击倒,要麽你把痛苦踩在脚下.
sentences.en: Just trample on the pain, or you'll be beat down by it.

sentences.en: Complications of gastric ulcers ( either benign or malignant ) include pain, bleeding, perforation, and obstruction.

sentences.en: Because of this, Professor Chen says itch research has in the shadow of pain research.

sentences.en: Ahsoka bit her tongue until the pain forced her to release it . " Well . "

sentences.en: For parotid pain, aspirin or codeine is quite effective.
